info.title: API ENDPOINTS
info.description: Shopier REST API OpenAPI Specification document

tags.name: Categories
tags.description: Operations to manage the product categories.

tags.name: Discounts
tags.description: Operations to manage the discount codes and automatic discounts.

tags.name: Selections
tags.description: Operations to manage the product selections.

tags.name: Variations
tags.description: Operations to manage the product variations.

title.description: Title of the product.

dateCreated.description: The date and time of the initial product listing. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

dateUpdated.description: The date and time of the product update. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

url.description:
The URL of the product. 
(e.g., https://www.shopier.com/696547)

placement.description: Ranking of the media file in product pages. Returns "1" for the primary media file.

discount.description: Represents whether there is a product based discount.

stockStatus.description: Current stock status of the product.

stockQuantity.description: Current stock quantity of the product.

shippingPayer.description: Represents who pays for shipping during dispatch or delivery.

categories.description: List of categories that product belongs to.

title.description: The title of category.

variants.description: List of variants of the product.

stockStatus.description: Current stock status of the variant.

stockQuantity.description: Current stock quantity of the variant.

options.description: List of options of the product.

title.description: The title of option.

singleOption.description: Represents whether a single option or multiple options can be selected during chekout.

customListing.description: Represents whether the listing is a custom or standard one.

customNote.description: Overrides the placeholder for note to seller field. Used for collecting a custom information from the buyer during checkout.

placementScore.description: Placement score of the product. Products with higher values are placed first in the store.

dispatchDuration.description: Dispatch duration in terms of days from seller to shipping company.

get.description: Returns a list of products with the provided limit, paging, sorting and filters. By default, products are returned in sorted order, with the most recent product listings appearing first.

parameters.name: dateStart
parameters.description: Show products listed at or after datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300)

parameters.name: dateEnd
parameters.description: Show products listed at or before datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-25T13:24:51+0300)

placement.description: Ranking of the product category in the shop. Returns "1" for the first category, increments accordingly.

get.description: Returns a list of product categories with the provided limit, paging and sorting. By default, categories are returned in sorted order according to their placement in storefront.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by their placements in storefront.

code.description: The discount code for the buyers used at the checkout.

dateCreated.description: The date and time for the creation of the discount code. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

amountOff.description: The absolute value of the discount amount. Used when the discount code type is "amount".

percentOff.description: The percentage rate of the discount. Used when the discount code type is "percent".

amountMinimum.description: Required minimum order amount for the discount code to be applicable.

numAvailable.description: Number of remaining discount codes that can be used.

numUsed.description: Number of times the discount code has been used.

expiresAt.description: Expiry date of the discount code. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).

get.description: Returns a list of discount codes with the provided limit, paging and sorting. By default, discount codes are returned in sorted order, with the most recent discount codes appearing first.

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: sort

id.description: The ID of the automatic discount.

title.description: The title of the automatic discount.

scope.description: The scope of the automatic discount. Automatic discounts can be applied for all or some of the products or categories.

productIds.description: List of product IDs the automatic discount is applicable. Used when the scope is "all" or "selectedProducts".

categoryIds.description: List of category IDs the automatic discount is applicable. Used when the scope is "all" or "selectedCategories".

dateCreated.description: The date and time for the creation of the automatic discount. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

amountOff.description: The absolute value of the discount amount. Used when the automatic discount type is "amount".

percentOff.description: The percentage rate of the discount. Used when the automatic discount type is "percent".

requirement.description: The requirement type of the automatic discount.

amountMinimum.description: The minimum purchase amount for the automatic discount to be applicable. Used when the automatic discount requirement is "amount".

quantityMinimum.description: The minimum number of items to be purchased for the automatic discount to be applicable. Used when the automatic discount requirement is "quantity".

startsAt.description: Start date of the automatic discount. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).

expiresAt.description: Expiry date of the automatic discount. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).

get.description: Returns a list of automatic discounts with the provided limit, paging and sorting. By default, automatic discounts are returned in sorted order, with the most recent discounts appearing first.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by date.

get.description: Returns a list of orders with the provided limit, paging, sorting and filters. By default, orders are returned in sorted order, with the most recent orders appearing first.

parameters.description: Show orders created at or after datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300)
parameters.name: dateStart

parameters.description: Show orders created at or before datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-25T13:24:51+0300)
parameters.name: dateEnd

limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by date.

status.description: Current fulfillment status of the order.

paymentStatus.description: Current payment status of the order (Currently only paid orders are in scope, unpaid is reserved for future use).

installments.description: Returns true if the payment is done in installments.

dateCreated.description: The date and time for the creation of the order. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

totals.description: The total amounts for all order line items.

subtotal.description: Subtotal amount for all the products and/or services sold.

total.description: Grand total amount of the order.

requestBody.description:
To close an order, provide fulfillments parameters.
To change the shipping address of an order, provide shippingInfo parameters.

get.description: Returns the order transaction with the provided order ID. Used for collecting additional financial information about the order.

dateCreated.description: The date and time for the creation of the transaction. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g. 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

gross.description: The gross amounts of the transaction.

originAmount.description: Total origin amount paid by the buyer.

payoutAmount.description: Gross payout amount. Fees will be deducted from this during payout.

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate used for the transaction if the originCurrency and payoutCurrency are different. Returns "1" if these currencies are same.

amount.description: Total fee amount of the transaction for the returned currency.

feeDetails.description: Details of fee(s) of the transaction.

type.description: Type of the single fee item.

currency.description: Fee currency of the single fee item.

amount.description: Fee amount of the single fee item.

installments.description: Returns the details of installment payments. Returns empty in case of an advance payment.

interestCost.description: Total interest cost over the term of installments.

net.description: The net amount of the transaction.

payoutAmount.description: Net payout amount. Fees are already deducted to calculate net payout amount.

get.description: Returns a list of Shopier Contracted Shippings with the provided limit, paging, sorting and filters. By default, shippings are returned in sorted order, with the recently created shipping codes appearing first.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by a shipping status.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by a shipping type.

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Filter by a shipping company.

parameters.name: dateCreatedStart
parameters.description: Show shipping codes that are created at or after datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300)

parameters.name: dateCreatedEnd
parameters.description: Show shipping codes that are created at or before datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-25T13:24:51+0300)

parameters.name: dateDispatchedStart
parameters.description: Show shippings that are dispatched at or after datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300)

parameters.name: dateDispatchedEnd
parameters.description: Show shippings that are dispatched at or before datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-25T13:24:51+0300)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort results by date.

get.description: Returns information about the shop's owner.

name.description: Name of the shop. This is the unique variable that appears at the end of the URL of the shop.

slogan.description: Slogan or catchword located at the shop's main page.

announcement.description: Announcement to buyers located at the shop's main page.

outOfStock.description: Represents whether the out of stock products are shown to buyers.

url.description:
The URL of the product. 
(e.g., https://www.shopier.com/696547)

placement.description: Ranking of the media file in product pages. Returns "1" for the primary media file.

discount.description: Represents whether there is a product based discount.

stockStatus.description: Current stock status of the product.

stockQuantity.description: Current stock quantity of the product.

shippingPayer.description: Represents who pays for shipping during dispatch or delivery.

categories.description: List of categories that product belongs to.

title.description: The title of category.

variants.description: List of variants of the product.

stockStatus.description: Current stock status of the variant.

stockQuantity.description: Current stock quantity of the variant.

options.description: List of options of the product.

title.description: The title of option.

singleOption.description: Represents whether a single option or multiple options can be selected during chekout.

customListing.description: Represents whether the listing is a custom or standard one.

customNote.description: Overrides the placeholder for note to seller field. Used for collecting a custom information from the buyer during checkout.

placementScore.description: Placement score of the product. Products with higher values are placed first in the store.

dispatchDuration.description: Dispatch duration in terms of days from seller to shipping company.

id.description: The ID of the product category.

title.description: The title of the product category.

placement.description: Ranking of the product category in the shop. Returns "1" for the first category, increments accordingly.

id.description: The ID of the product variation.

title.description: The title of the product variation.

placement.description: Ranking of the product variation in the shop. Returns "1" for the first variation, returns "2" for the second variation.

id.description: The ID of the product selection, a subset of product variation.

title.description: The title of the product selection, a subset of product variation.

variationId.description: The ID of the related product variation.

code.description: The discount code for the buyers used at the checkout.

dateCreated.description: The date and time for the creation of the discount code. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

amountOff.description: The absolute value of the discount amount. Used when the discount code type is "amount".

percentOff.description: The percentage rate of the discount. Used when the discount code type is "percent".

amountMinimum.description: Required minimum order amount for the discount code to be applicable.

numAvailable.description: Number of remaining discount codes that can be used.

numUsed.description: Number of times the discount code has been used.

expiresAt.description: Expiry date of the discount code. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).

id.description: The ID of the automatic discount.

title.description: The title of the automatic discount.

scope.description: The scope of the automatic discount. Automatic discounts can be applied for all or some of the products or categories.

productIds.description: List of product IDs the automatic discount is applicable. Used when the scope is "all" or "selectedProducts".

categoryIds.description: List of category IDs the automatic discount is applicable. Used when the scope is "all" or "selectedCategories".

dateCreated.description: The date and time for the creation of the automatic discount. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300).

amountOff.description: The absolute value of the discount amount. Used when the automatic discount type is "amount".

percentOff.description: The percentage rate of the discount. Used when the automatic discount type is "percent".

requirement.description: The requirement type of the automatic discount.

amountMinimum.description: The minimum purchase amount for the automatic discount to be applicable. Used when the automatic discount requirement is "amount".

quantityMinimum.description: The minimum number of items to be purchased for the automatic discount to be applicable. Used when the automatic discount requirement is "quantity".

startsAt.description: Start date of the automatic discount. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).

expiresAt.description: Expiry date of the automatic discount. yyyy-MM-ddZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21+0300).

status.description: Current fulfillment status of the order.

paymentStatus.description: Current payment status of the order (Currently only paid orders are in scope, unpaid is reserved for future use).

installments.description: Returns true if the payment is done in installments.

total.description: Grand total amount of the order.
